oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and characterisation of saccharide complexes of La(III) ion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MUKHOPADHYAY, A
KOLEHMAINEN, E
RAO, CP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: chemistry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A series of ten La(III)-saccharide complexes have been synthesised with eight different monosaccharides ( D-glucose, fructose, D-galactose, D-mannose, L-sorbose, D-arabinose, D-ribose and D-xylose) and two disaccharides ( D-maltose and D-lactose), and characterised by analytical, spectral and electrochemical techniques. C-13 NMR spectra reveal interesting binding modes of saccharide molecules towards La(III).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION A-INORGANIC BIO-INORGANIC PHYSICAL THEORETICAL & ANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY, 41(8), 1621-1624
